pages.privacy-policy: Sunstone - Privacy Policy and Data Protection Sunstone HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Your Privacy at Sunstone We take your privacy seriously at Sunstone. We're committed to keeping your information safe and secure, and only using it in ways you understand and expect. What Information We Collect When you book something awesome with us or interact with our services, we might collect information like your name, contact details, and preferences. This helps us make sure your experience is smooth and enjoyable. Using Your Information for Good We use your information to process bookings, provide the best service possible, and keep you in the loop about cool new stuff and updates. It also helps us improve Sunstone for everyone. Sharing with Trusted Partners Sometimes, we might need to share your information with trusted service providers who help us with things like payment processing, customer support, and even showing you relevant offers. But rest assured, we only share what's absolutely necessary, and we make sure they keep your information safe too. Keeping Your Information Secure We take security seriously and use strong measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or misuse. Think of it like Fort Knox for your data! You're in Control Your information belongs to you. You have the right to access, update, or even request deletion of your information. Just let us know if you have any questions or want to exercise these rights. We're always happy to help! The Sunstone website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: Sunstone - Terms and Conditions for Service and Use Sunstone HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Temrs and Conditions to Sunstone!
